column9: The Abstract methods configure_for_preview and  ensure_visibility_in_preview of the interface class IDesignerPluginare left as pass. Therefore, they might be accidentally used, without implementation. Raising NotImplementedError to avoid it. However, other methods in the same file are decorated with abstractmethod.Should discuss with owners if it is intended to have no action as default. ## Discuss with owner and it is intendded. Changed to return None to clarify that.

Catching Exception might hide unexpected exceptions (e.g., due to new code that will be added).   The method _code_process_property_value of the class  AutocompleteBaseBO calls cvalues = f"{value.split()}" (in line 29).Split does not raise exceptions.https://docs.python.org/3.3/library/stdtypes.htmlThe handling is just pass, which increase the risk of missing unexpected exceptions, If value is None then AttributeError will be raised.

The method _process_property_value of class ToplevelPreviewBaseBO had 13 branches, and method configure of class ToplevelPreviewMixin had 16 branches while Pylint recommends not to have more than 12.  The methods were structured so I extracted a method for handling geometry, width, and height.

Catching Exception might hide unexpected exceptions (e.g., due to new code that will be added). Function crop_widget catches Exception in line 18.The try section iswidget.configure(takefocus=False) It seems that widget has many subclasses so many exceptions are possible.The handling is just pass so there is a risk of not noticing unexpected exceptions.

Method __load_layout_v1_0 of class UIDefinition had 7 nested blocks while Pylint recommends not to have more than 5.I extracted the method _handle_child_layouts fixing this alert and too-many-branches too.
